bdy.p:
Reprise Media is a
U.S.
-based corporation, established in 2003, and headquartered in
New York
, NY. The company is a Search Engine Marketing firm that helps enterprise-level companies manage and optimize their customer acquisition programs through search and other auction-based digital media. Reprise Media was named "2006 Agency of the Year Best Search" by OMMA Magazine and was ranked among the 30 Fastest Growing Private Companies in 2005 and 2006 by
Entrepreneur Magazine
. In 2007, Reprise Media was acquired by the
Interpublic Group of Companies
, joining
Facebook , Spotrunner, and other investments within IPG's Futures Media Group.

Reprise Media is headquartered in
New York City , with offices in San Francisco and Boston. Searchviews is Reprise Media's blog on the Search Marketing Industry.

sec.p: Joshua Stylman and Peter Hershberg co-founded Reprise Media in 2003. Reprise Media developed from their experience as members of the management team of Ask Jeeves (now [http://www.ask.com Ask.com), a leading Internet search engine. Reprise Media’s original team was comprised of industry leaders in online media, including former employees from Modem Media, iTraffic and Avenue A.
Reprise Media provides search marketing services based on a campaign management strategy that blends Paid Search marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Paid inclusion, and Social media marketing.

list.entry: Keyword Discovery : Discovery of keywords that website visitors are using to find products and services online.
Creative Development : Creation of highly-targeted pay per click advertising messages.
Landing page Development : Consultation on the design of landing pages to improve relevancy (or Quality Score) of paid search advertisement.
Bid Management : Goal-based management of pay per click advertising to meet Return on Investment goals.
Reporting & Analysis : Data analysis and improvement recommendations for a search engine marketing campaign.
Website Design Consultation : Technical review of site architecture, content and layout.
Competitor Analysis : Analysis of marketplace and search-specific competition.
Keyword Research : Keyword ranking by popularity, competition, and density.
Website Content Optimization : Recommendations on meta tags, website copywriting, and URL optimization.
Linking : Creation of partnerships with link providers and management of web directory submissions.
SEO Reporting : Monthly and quarterly search engine placement and traffic reports.
Site Spider : Information extraction from a client's website pages to be submitted to search engines and web directories
RSS Feed Generation : Organization of website content into formats specified by search engines and web directories
RSS Feed Submission and Management : Submission and management of RSS feeds.
Strategy Development : Identification of message, audience, and plan for client campaigns.
Blogger Outreach : Relationship-building with and outreach to visible bloggers.
Distribution : Optimization of press releases, videos and other online media for distribution on social networks.
Training : Training curriculum on effectively integrating social media into future marketing strategies.

ss1.p: PROSuite is Reprise Media's campaign management platform that automates the process of Producing, Reporting and Optimizing campaigns for enterprise search marketing. PROSuite can be implemented with any keyword or category-targeted media, bid management or tracking software. The platform manages content, keyword list and creative copy generation, tracking URLs, and bid management. It includes a client-facing extranet.

Launched in 2005, FeedCast is a patent-pending product that helps publishers promote breaking news content through search and other auction-based platforms. Feedcast converts
RSS content into a search engine marketing campaign. Reprise Media created FeedCast for major publishing brands, professional bloggers, classified advertising services, and other companies with frequently updated content. In 2006, FeedCast drove more than 20 million readers to top-tier news publishers.
Feedcast uses three steps to help publishers promote content:

list.entry:
Intelligent Content Extraction : FeedCast analyzes XML or
RSS feeds to extract key terms and concepts that are generated into paid search ads based on time-sensitive content.

Automatic Content Conversion : FeedCast converts terms and concepts into a series of advertising assets, which are customized to work within the specifications of a search engine or contextual network in the campaign.

Pre-Approved Campaign Launch : Finally, completed campaigns are launched in a condensed timeline due to a built-in editorial rule set and direct trafficking of campaigns to search and contextual programs through APIs.

sec.p:
The Reprise Media network includes the company's website, www.reprisemedia.com, the company's search news blog, www.searchviews.com, a Twitter account, and two pages on
Facebook , for Reprise Media and Searchviews.

ss1.p: Searchviews is the official blog of Reprise Media. The company uses it to share breaking news, insider analysis and opinions with their partners, clients and the search community at large.
Searchviews represents current thinking from a range of perspectives surrounding the Search Engine Marketing industry.
Searchviews was named a “Must Read” blog by B2B Magazine in 2005, and was a finalist for the Internet Advertising Award for Best Blog in 2006.

list.entry: June : Reprise Media Managing Partners Peter Hershberg & Joshua Stylman named finalists for Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year (NY region)
January : Reprise Media named Best Search Agency of 2006 by OMMA Magazine
November : Forrester WAVE Report Calls Reprise Media "Biggest Breakout Star" in Search Marketing
September : Reprise Media named finalists for 2006 OMMA Awards Search Copy Campaign of the Year
August : Jupiter Constellation Report Validates Reprise Media's Leadership Position in the Search Marketing Industry
June : Reprise Media named #26 in Entrepreneur Magazine’s 2006 Hot 100
June : Reprise Media named #30 in Entrepreneur Magazine’s 2005 Hot 100
June : Reprise Media Managing Partners Peter Hershberg & Joshua Stylman named finalists for Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year (NY region)

sec.p:
Reprise Media clients include:
Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia ,
PeoplePC
,
Microsoft ,
USA Network ,
USA Today , Hearst Publications, Princeton Review,
Guess and
Bluefly .
